alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:27PM MST until January 11 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulation two to four inches with highest amounts over the Continental Divide. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin along the Idaho and Montana border late this evening and continue through Wednesday morning before ending. Snow may be moderate at times late tonight along the Divide including over Monida and Raynolds pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
